narrative.narrative: Zimbabwe flyafrica.com is a low cost airline founded in 2014 that is based at Harare,Zimbabwe. It flies from Harare and Victoria Falls and starting in 2015 from Bulawayo, to Johannesburg in South Africa and also to Windhoek,Namibia from Johannesburg and Capetown with a new Namibia flyafrica.com subsidiary. At January 2015 its fleet was five 737-500's.
